name: df-gfoo
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cgfo, cmpt(s0, cprime, csb(s1, cfv(czn, cv(s0)), co(cv(s1), cpsl, cmpt(s2, cn, csn(csb(s3, cfv(cpl1, cv(s1)), csb(s4, cfv(cv1, cv(s1)), co(co(co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s2)), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cv(s3))), cv(s4)), cfv(csg, cv(s3)), cv(s4))))))))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ GF_oo =(s0 ∈ Prime ↦[(Z/nZ ` s0)/ s1](s1[polySplitLim](s2 ∈ ℕ ↦ {[(Poly1 ` s1)/ s3][(var1 ` s1)/ s4](((s0[^]s2)[(.g `(mulGrp ` s3))]s4)[(-g ` s3)]s4)})))
comment: Define the Galois field of order ` p ^ +oo ` , as a direct limit of the Galois finite fields. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
